enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of Working Group I (WGI) of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) and Thirty-sixth Session of the IPCC
sentences: This session, held from 11-14 October 2010 in Busan, Republic of Korea, addressed the recommendations of the IAC Review.
The Panel adopted a number of decisions in this regard, including on the treatment of grey literature and uncertainty, and on a process to address errors in previous reports.

To address recommendations that required further examination, the Panel established task groups on processes and procedures, communications, Conflict of Interest (COI) policy, and governance and management.
The Panel also accepted a revised outline for the AR5 SYR.
